author: √Å. Pi√±eiro
title: Encontro de docentes con alumnado e exalumnado xitano dos centros de Poio
text:
A Escola Unitaria do Vao, o IES de Poio, o CEIP de Vi√±as e a Fundaci√≥n Secretariado Xitano promoveron este martes unha xornada de encontro entre alumnado, exalumnado xitano e profesorado de todos os centros.
Esta reuni√≥n celebrouse no local social de O Vao e para lograr a maior participaci√≥n posible, todas as familias de alumnos foran convidadas.
Contouse tam√©n con todo o alumnado que pasara no pasado polas aulas dos centros, dando as√≠ oportunidade de que se reencontraran con mestres e mestras cos que tiveran v√≠nculos no pasado.
No encontro participaron tam√©n o alcalde, √Ångel Moldes, a edil de Educaci√≥n, Natalia Sabar√≠s, e a inspectora de Educaci√≥n da zona de Poio. A proposta quer√≠a ser un lugar de encontro e visibilizaci√≥n da presenza de alumnas e alumnos procedentes de O Vao e do seu papel na comunidade escolar. "Son un piar do alumnado de todos vos centros" e "un sinal de identidade" dos mesmos, afirman desde o IES de Poio, explicando que todas as directivas puxeron especial empe√±o en facer saber aos alumnos e alumnas que forman parte da diversidade e pluralidade de cada un dos dous colexios e o instituto.
Mensaxe positiva para as familias
A proposta quer√≠a facer chegar a bagaxe positiva √°s familias, pero tam√©n co√±ecer e escoitar, fortalecer v√≠nculos e crear alianzas sostibles que impulsen unha educaci√≥n diversa.
A xornada contou cun √°gape para os participantes e resultou un encontro distendido.
Non foi o √∫nico evento que este ano visibilizou √° veci√±anza de O Vao nos centros educativos. As√≠, a Xunta presentou novas unidades did√°cticas sobre o pobo xitano para promover desde a aula o co√±ecemento da historia desta etnia e a s√∫a riqueza cultural e avanzar na inclusi√≥n educativa da diversidade cun acto no IES de Poio o pasado mes de abril.

author: , USA TODAY
title: Josh Allen publicly thanks former Buffalo Bills teammate Stefon Diggs
text: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen publicly thanked ex-teammate Stefon Diggs on Thursday, and revealed he sent a text message to the wide receiver. ‚ÄúYeah, I shared a text with him and got one back, just thanking him for everything that he did for me,‚Äù Allen told reporters Thursday's in his first public comments since the Bills traded Diggs . ‚ÄúI‚Äôll always have a spot in my heart for him and I‚Äôll always love him like a brother and wish him nothing but the best.‚Äù The Bills traded Diggs to the Houston Texans earlier this month after the receiver spent four seasons in Buffalo. Diggs‚Äô tenure in upstate New York was eventful. Diggs led the NFL in receptions and receiving yards in 2020, he had four consecutive seasons with more than 100 receptions and had four straight invitations to the Pro Bowl. However, there were times when Diggs‚Äô frustration boiled over on the sideline at Allen and other teammates. The wideout missed the first day of mandatory minicamp in 2023 and he‚Äôs made cryptic comments on social media. Diggs‚Äô production dipped midway through 2023. He finished the season with 11 straight regular-season games with less than 100 receiving yards and had just 73 combined receiving yards in Buffalo‚Äôs two playoff games last season. The Bills subsequently traded the star wideout to Houston after Diggs‚Äô time in Buffalo appeared to have run its course at the conclusion of the 2023 season. ‚ÄúMy lasting memory of (Stefon) will be the receiver that helped me become the quarterback that I am today,‚Äù Allen said. ‚ÄúI will always thank him for that.‚Äù Allen‚Äôs two Pro Bowl selections (2020 and 2022) came with Diggs as his leading receiver. Diggs‚Äô departure created a massive hole at wide receiver in Buffalo. In addition to trading away Diggs, the Bills also lost their No. 2 wide receiver, Gabe Davis , to the Jacksonville Jaguars in free agency. Follow USA TODAY Sports' Tyler Dragon on X @TheTylerDragon .

author: VNExplorer
title: Jorge As√≠s dijo que Milei tiene que "circular exactamente por el medio": "Macri depende de su suerte y el peronismo necesita que caiga"
text:
A casi dos meses desde la asunci√≥n de Javier Milei, Jorge ‚ÄúTurco‚Äù As√≠s realiz√≥ un nuevo an√°lisis de la gesti√≥n del libertario. Con met√°foras donde remarca el ‚Äúolor a riesgo de colapso‚Äù, el analista pol√≠tico le aconsej√≥ al mandatario ‚Äúcircular exactamente por el medio‚Äù para as√≠ evitar una crisis de poder. Asimismo, manifest√≥ el papel que tiene en distintos actores pol√≠ticos, entre los que mencion√≥ al expresidente Mauricio Macri, quien ‚Äúdepende de la suerte‚Äù del jefe de Estado, y al peronismo, que ‚Äúnecesita que se caiga pronto‚Äù.
Con el t√≠tulo ‚ÄúEl tren fantasma entre las calas‚Äù, el analista pol√≠tico realiz√≥ una columna donde examina, por un lado, el rol de Milei durante las elecciones y el estado actual de su gesti√≥n luego de sus primeras medidas y, por el otro, los pr√≥ximos pasos que deber√° dar el presidente en un escenario marcado por el peronismo y los espacios no peronistas.
‚ÄúEl presidente Javier Milei, El Menem Trucho, Mauricio Macri, el √Ångel Exterminador y el ontol√≥gicamente proto/oficialista Miguel Pichetto, El Lepenito, comparten los esfuerzos tit√°nicos por reivindicar de manera indirecta al peronismo y facilitarle el regreso al poder‚Äù, comienza el escrito. En ese sentido, advirti√≥ que ‚Äúsu gesti√≥n ya huele, en efecto, a calas, o a riesgo de colapso‚Äù. ‚ÄúDepende justamente de los radicales vacilantes y de la estructura fulminada de Juntos por el Cambio que de pronto se muestra fortalecida. El mero esqueleto de JxC puede salvar a Milei‚Äù, argument√≥.
Al respecto, y con el objetivo de ‚Äúevitar el florecimiento olfativo de las calas penetrantes‚Äù, consider√≥ que ‚ÄúMilei necesita circular exactamente por el medio. Entre el rencor de los peronistas derrotados, y las adhesiones republicanas de los convencidos que se entregan a la odisea de acabar con ‚Äòla decadencia'‚Äù. ‚ÄúEn efecto, Milei atraviesa una suerte de corredor de la muerte. Plagado de accidentes naturalmente geogr√°ficos‚Äù, remarc√≥.
Jorge As√≠s tild√≥ a Javier Milei de ‚ÄúMenem Trucho‚Äù
Continuando su an√°lisis, As√≠s consider√≥ que de un lado del ‚Äútren fantasma‚Äù se encuentra el peronismo, que mantiene ‚Äúel inquietante deseo de que el tren fantasma de Milei se caiga. Que la alborotada epopeya concluya pronto. Con el porrazo del descarrilamiento‚Äù. Del otro, est√°n los ‚Äúheroicos dem√≥cratas‚Äù, a quienes el presidente ‚Äúlos tiene apesadumbrados‚Äù: ‚ÄúSon los sensibles bienintencionados que suplican por la consolidaci√≥n de la modernidad. Para que comiencen los demorados aciertos‚Äù.
En ese sentido, indic√≥ que los sectores no peronistas ‚Äúdependen‚Äù de que le vaya bien al libertario: ‚ÄúPara la persistencia del ‚Äòno peronismo‚Äô la suerte de Milei es sistem√°ticamente trascendental. Como para el peronismo‚Äù. ‚Äú‚ÄòSi a Milei le va mal nosotros somos boleta‚Äô. Lo confirma el apasionado adicto de PRO que supo, en 2015, ser un vibrante ¬´torcedor¬ª del colectivo ¬´Cambiemos¬ª. (Por entonces pugnaba por la utop√≠a de vencer al peronismo. Y se anot√≥ hasta como fiscal. Le toc√≥ una mesa de Los Polvorines)‚Äù, agreg√≥.
En la otra vereda, est√°n los peronistas, que ‚Äúnecesitan que Milei se caiga ya, de ser posible ayer‚Äù. A su criterio, dicho argumento ‚Äúlegitima la estrategia de silencio que se impone La Doctora‚Äù. ‚ÄúCon el paso de las semanas, las culpabilidades de La Doctora se aten√∫an. Pocos meses m√°s de Milei pueden producir la tenacidad del olvido‚Äù, a√±adi√≥.
A modo de conclusi√≥n, consider√≥ que ‚Äús√≥lo si Milei se destapa como un transformador superior a Carlos Menem puede admitirse el relato de la mala hoteler√≠a. O el entendimiento inexplicable con Ir√°n. O cualquier otra irrelevancia que utiliz√≥ la pol√≠tica para elevar el error de entregarla‚Äù.
‚ÄúHasta hoy, al tren fantasma de Milei le cuesta acomodarse en alguna estaci√≥n racional. Resulta entonces innecesario leer los informes inteligentes de la consultora de C√≥rdoba para darse cuenta que la sociedad le pierde paulatinamente el respeto. Como si Milei fuera un anillo brillantemente ordinario. Una reliquia que no merece el menor compromiso electoral‚Äù, finaliz√≥.
La columna completa de Jorge As√≠s 1.- Pasi√≥n por la par√°bola El presidente Javier Milei, El Menem Trucho, Mauricio Macri, el √Ångel Exterminador y el ontol√≥gicamente proto/oficialista Miguel Pichetto, El Lepenito, comparten los esfuerzos tit√°nicos por reivindicar de manera indirecta al peronismo y facilitarle el regreso al poder. La violenta irrupci√≥n de Milei en la pol√≠tica instal√≥ rabiosamente la pasi√≥n por la par√°bola. El marketinero panelista fue especulativamente repotenciado por el peronismo para debilitar a Mauricio y el Artificio sublime de Juntos por el Cambio. Con el invento, Sergio Massa, El Profesional, tuvo suerte. Pero no pudo evitar que la invenci√≥n de Milei construyera la par√°bola: Concluir asociado con Mauricio, pero para vencer a Massa.
Milei es presidente desde hace casi 60 d√≠as y su gesti√≥n ya huele, en efecto, a calas. A riesgo de colapso. Depende justamente de los radicales vacilantes y de la estructura fulminada de Juntos por el Cambio que se muestra, de pronto, fortalecida. El mero esqueleto de JxC puede salvar a Milei. Basta contemplar la fotograf√≠a realista del Consejo Federal de Inversiones. El destino de Mauricio depende de c√≥mo le vaya a Milei con el arrebato volc√°nico de una gesti√≥n que arranca con el terremoto innovador que ostenta el desaf√≠o de diluirse en medio vaso con agua. Mauricio fue colonizado culturalmente por Milei. Es Milei quien se propone hacer, en 2024, lo que Mauricio debi√≥ intentar en 2016. Pero el pobre Angelito no pudo encarar ninguna proeza innovadora porque de inmediato fue neutralizado por la impotencia conformista de los cautelosos asesores que prefer√≠an la placidez del gradualismo.
2.- Por el medio Para evitar el florecimiento olfativo de las calas penetrantes, Milei necesita circular exactamente por el medio. Entre el rencor de los peronistas derrotados, y las adhesiones republicanas de los convencidos que se entregan a la odisea de acabar con ‚Äúla decadencia‚Äù. En efecto, Milei atraviesa una suerte de corredor de la muerte. Plagado de accidentes naturalmente geogr√°ficos. Como una met√°fora del tren fantasma que mantiene, a su izquierda, al peronismo. Con el inquietante deseo de que el tren fantasma de Milei se caiga. Que la alborotada epopeya concluya pronto. Con el porrazo del descarrilamiento. Y en el costado derecho del tren fantasma, Milei los tiene apesadumbrados a los heroicos dem√≥cratas. Son los sensibles bienintencionados que suplican por la consolidaci√≥n de la modernidad. Para que comiencen los demorados aciertos.
‚ÄúSi a Milei le va mal nosotros somos boleta‚Äù. Lo confirma el apasionado adicto de PRO que supo, en 2015, ser un vibrante ¬´torcedor¬ª del colectivo ¬´Cambiemos¬ª. (Por entonces pugnaba por la utop√≠a de vencer al peronismo. Y se anot√≥ hasta como fiscal. Le toc√≥ una mesa de Los Polvorines). Para la persistencia del ‚Äúno peronismo‚Äù la suerte de Milei es sistem√°ticamente trascendental. Como para el peronismo.
‚ÄúLos peronistas necesitan que Milei se caiga ya, de ser posible ayer‚Äù. Argumento que legitima la estrategia de silencio que se impone La Doctora. Con el paso de las semanas, las culpabilidades de La Doctora se aten√∫an. Pocos meses m√°s de Milei pueden producir la tenacidad del olvido.
S√≥lo si Milei se destapa como un transformador superior a Carlos Menem puede admitirse el relato de la mala hoteler√≠a. O el entendimiento inexplicable con Ir√°n. O cualquier otra irrelevancia que utiliz√≥ la pol√≠tica para elevar el error de entregarla
Hasta hoy, al tren fantasma de Milei le cuesta acomodarse en alguna estaci√≥n racional. Resulta entonces innecesario leer los informes inteligentes de la consultora de C√≥rdoba para darse cuenta que la sociedad le pierde paulatinamente el respeto. Como si Milei fuera un anillo brillantemente ordinario. Una reliquia que no merece el menor compromiso electoral.
MB / Gi

author: Byrman
title: Alerta por avistamiento de caimanes tras desbordamientos de r√≠os en Manab√≠
text:
Actualizado 18:45
Redacci√≥n Teleamazonas.com |
El aumento del caudal de los r√≠os en la provincia de Manab√≠ ha provocado el avisatamiento de caimanes. As√≠ lo alert√≥ el Ministerio del Ambiente este mi√©rcoles 5 de marzo del 2025.
La cartera de Estado se√±al√≥ en un comunicado que por la √©poca invernal se han registrado avistamientos de caimanes (Caiman crocodilus) en zonas rurales y urbanas de la provincia de Manab√≠.
La autoridad recomend√≥, en caso de observar ejemplares de esta especie, mantener un adistancia prudente, evitar la manipulaci√≥n de estos reptieles y comunicar al ECU911 a fin de coordinar el rescate a trav√©s de t√©cnicos especializados.
Lea tambi√©n
La provincia de Manab√≠ se encuentra en estado de emergencia. Portoviejo, Bol√≠var y Manta son los cantones m√°s afectados por las lluvias.
Las fuertes lluvias han impactado gravemente en 16 de sus 22 cantones. El temporal deja deslaves, inundaciones, desbordamientos de r√≠os, da√±os en v√≠as y cientos de familias damnificadas y aisladas.
Entre los cantones de Manab√≠ m√°s afectados est√°n: Portoviejo, Tosagua, Santa Ana, Paj√°n, 24 de Mayo, Rocafuerte, Bol√≠var, Sucre, Jipijapa y Tosagua.
Tambi√©n en Teleamazonas
‚Äî Teleamazonas (@teleamazonasec)
[#ATENCI√ìN]| üåßÔ∏è Lluvias que cayeron en Guayaquil durante dos d√≠as alcanzar√≠an para llenar seis estadios Modelo. Alcalde se pronuncia[https://t.co/RhGyKaOzzy][pic.twitter.com/Sct87k7wy9][March 5, 2025]

author: Emma Ascott
title: Colorado police department implements the 4-day work week ‚Äî with great success
text:
A police department in Golden, Colorado, recently transitioned to a 32-hour workweek ‚Äî a significant shift from the traditional longer hours associated with law enforcement. This change has been met with surprise by many within the department, as the concept of a reduced workweek was previously unfathomable in this profession.
The trend towards shorter workweeks has gained momentum globally, especially as remote work has become more prevalent, allowing for increased flexibility. While some labor groups have pushed for a four-day workweek during negotiations, this particular police department‚Äôs adjustment to a condensed schedule posed several challenges but also presented an opportunity to test the feasibility of such a change across various job roles within the city‚Äôs workforce.
City officials held community meetings to address concerns about the new schedule, emphasizing that the expectation was not for employees to work less but rather to maintain or increase productivity within fewer hours. They aimed to ensure that service levels would remain consistent or improve despite the reduced hours.
Employees, including those in investigative roles, initially found the adjustment to be stressful, having to condense their workload into fewer days. However, many reported improvements in focus and productivity, as well as personal well-being thanks to an extra day off each week dedicated to family and personal time, according to
CNN Business.
Public sentiment toward the shortened workweek has been positive, with high satisfaction scores from employees and no negative feedback from the community. The pilot program is being closely monitored for its effects on productivity and efficiency, with personal assessments forming an integral part of the evaluation.
As well as improving current staff well-being, the new work schedule is seen as a potential advantage in recruiting and retaining personnel in a field that has faced challenges in these areas. One new officer cited the shortened workweek as a motivating factor for joining the department, hoping it becomes a permanent feature.
Should the pilot prove successful, it may be expanded to include all city employees, though adjustments might vary based on role and responsibilities.
CNN

author: VNExplorer
title: Dubai's coolest neighbourhood? How JLT is keeping temperatures down
text:
Jumeirah Lakes Towers just might be Dubai‚Äôs coolest neighbourhood ‚Äì and it‚Äôs got nothing to do with its array of restaurants, shimmering waters and high-rise towers.
Instead, it stems from how neighbourhood design ‚Äì including how much vegetation there is ‚Äì can limit temperature increases amid the all-year sunshine of the UAE.
Jumeirah Lakes Towers, more widely known as JLT, has been hailed as a prime example of a how a carefully planned district can benefit its community.
‚ÄúThe area boasts ample greenery, including landscaped parks and lakes, which play a crucial role in reducing ambient temperatures through shading and evapotranspiration [in which plants and the soil release water],‚Äù Dr Ansar Khan, an assistant professor in the Department of Geography at the University of Calcutta in India, said.
Reimagining city living
Researchers used computer modelling to determine ways temperatures could be reduced in bustling Downtown Dubai. Chris Whiteoak / The National
Dr Khan and co-researchers at the University of New South Wales in Sydney, Australia, published a study last month highlighting how the materials used on a building and in the neighbourhood around it affect how much energy is required for air conditioning.
They used computer modelling to analyse the effect on buildings in the built-up area of Downtown Dubai of changing the reflectivity of materials on roofs, walls and pavements, and altering the amount of vegetation.
If ‚Äúcool‚Äù materials that reflect solar radiation and emit heat are used, the building can, Dr Khan said, better manage its temperature and reduce the urban heat island effect, in which built-up areas become hotter.
‚ÄúThe surrounding neighbourhood‚Äôs design and materials can also impact the building‚Äôs microclimate indirectly,‚Äù he added.
‚ÄúFor example, nearby structures, vegetation, and paving materials in the neighbourhood can affect the amount of solar radiation reflected or absorbed, thereby influencing the overall thermal environment of the building and its surroundings.‚Äù
Published in Energy and Buildings, the study showed that factors such as using reflective materials and having high levels of vegetation can reduce a building‚Äôs energy demand for cooling by as much as 36.4 per cent.
‚ÄúSuch a substantial reduction indicates the potential of combining increased vegetation fractions and cool materials to mitigate urban heat island effects and lower energy consumption in urban areas, particularly in extreme desert climates like Dubai downtown,‚Äù Dr Khan said.
‚ÄúIt underscores the importance of implementing sustainable and innovative solutions to address the challenges posed by urbanisation and climate change.‚Äù
He said incorporating cool strategies into neighbourhoods during in the design stage is ideal, and developers could be given incentives to do so.
However, existing areas can be ‚Äúretrofitted‚Äù to make them more resistant to heating, for example by applying reflective coatings to roofs.
Planting trees or creating vegetation-covered green roofs and green walls can both reduce heating and improve air quality.
‚ÄúEngaging residents and stakeholders in urban greening projects can foster community resilience and create shared spaces that promote well-being and environmental sustainability,‚Äù Dr Khan said.
Cutting energy use from air conditioning is seen as especially important in the UAE, because it accounts for as much as 70 per cent of the country‚Äôs electricity consumption.
The amount of energy used to cool internal spaces in the Middle East jumped from 25 terawatt hours to 125 terawatt hours between 1990 and 2016, a five-fold increase, according to World Bank figures.
Forecasts, also from the World Bank, indicate that the number of air conditioning units globally is set to triple by the middle of the century.
Why JLT is leading the way
JLT boasts plenty of green spaces nestled among its various clusters of buildings. Photo: The National
At JLT, as well as its parks and lakes, the design of the buildings reduces heating, Dr Khan said.
‚ÄúMany buildings in Jumeirah Lakes Towers are equipped with advanced cooling technologies and energy-efficient designs, such as insulated facades and reflective surfaces.
‚ÄúThese features work in tandem to minimise heat absorption and decrease the reliance on excessive air conditioning, thereby reducing overall cooling energy demand,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúOverall, Jumeirah Lakes Towers serves as a prime example of a well-planned neighbourhood in Dubai that successfully integrates scientific cooling strategies in its urban design, setting a benchmark for sustainable and comfortable living in the challenging desert climate,‚Äù he said.
The new study is the latest to demonstrate how cooling can be achieved by ways other than turning up the air conditioning.
In December researchers from the University of Sharjah revealed that air conditioning demand in a two-storey, three-bedroom villa could be cut by 40 per cent with better shading, ventilation and insulation.
Other research, from 2022, found that traditional UAE neighbourhoods, such as Al Fahidi in Dubai, with its high density of buildings, tended to be cooler during the hottest periods of the day than some more modern areas, such as low-rise parts of Jumeirah.
Two factors helping to keep Al Fahidi cool are its greater building height-to-width ratio compared to Jumeirah and its lower sky view factor, the amount of sky visible from the ground.
